attributes.action: support a viewing boycott of the Olympic Games.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In protest at the treatment of Tibet and general Human Rights abuses the undersigned pledge to not watch any Olympic Coverage. The politicians won't stop the athletes going but we can damage the games commercially by refusing to watch.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
